page.title: 04WILDLIFE
page.content: The block is without doubt rich in {flora}and{fauna.} Although very much a man made landscape field boudaries are usually rich{hedgerows,}many dating back over 500years. These splendid habitats shelter primroses, violets, honeysuckle, red campions, common sorrel, red & white deadnettle, foxgloves, lords and ladies and white heliotrope.{Ferns}add to the lushness with polypods, hartstongue and broad buckler. The{lichen}usnea subfloridana is an indicator of the purity of the air in the upper Sid. {Roe deer,}stoats, fox, grey squirrels are all to be seen. The bird life abounds with robins, marsh tits tree creepers and most magnificent of all the soaring{buzzard.}Five buzzards were spotted on Pen Hill on 12th Oct. 1985.
